name: Rippit
description:
Rippit is a cute puzzle game, where the goal is to get little origami frogs to their designated spots. The challenge being - they can't walk on another color than theirs!

Controls

WSAD - moving
E - Leave little frog
A special button with special interaction

The game was created for a course Scripting 1 in Howest DAE. It's made in Unreal Engine with blueprints by me.
Background image and animations were made by Mari Gallet.
